speakerSchedule.speechDescription: Check-in and enjoy complimentary breakfast while networking with fellow attendees

speakerSchedule.speechTitle: Keynote - TinaCMS and the road ahead
speakerSchedule.speechDescription: Join us for the Keynote - TinaCMS and the Road Ahead, where we'll explore the future of TinaCMS. Discover upcoming features, improvements, and the vision shaping its development.

speakerSchedule.speechTitle: From Starter to Stunner: Automating Static Sites with TinaCMS & GitHub Actions
speakerSchedule.speechDescription: Take your GitHub profile to the next level by building and automating a statically generated website with TinaCMS. In this session, we’ll walk through setting up a site using the TinaCMS starter, fetching dynamic content, and leveraging GitHub Actions to automate deployment.

speakerSchedule.speechTitle: The Art of Git-Based Content Management with GitHub
speakerSchedule.speechDescription: Managing content shouldn’t be a chaotic mess of outdated files, endless email threads, or confusing version names. Whether you're working on blogs, documentation, or even entire websites, GitHub offers a powerful yet often underutilised way to streamline your workflow.

speakerSchedule.speechTitle: Optimizing AI Development: MCP Servers & Cursor Workflows
speakerSchedule.speechDescription: Discover how to streamline AI development with efficient workflows using Cursor and MCP Servers. This session will cover best practices for managing AI-driven projects, optimizing development pipelines, and leveraging MCP Servers for scalable processing.
Indulge in a unique lunch featuring creamy Llama Milkshakes and crispy Yak Wings, crafted for adventurous foodies at TinaCon 2025!
Unwind at the TinaCon After Party with great music, refreshing drinks, and lively networking—celebrate a day of innovation in style!
Discover how to efficiently manage and edit your website content using TinaCMS, a powerful and user-friendly content management system.

speakerSchedule.speechTitle: Mastering the Balance: SSR vs. CSR in Next.js for Optimal Performance
speakerSchedule.speechDescription: Unlock the full potential of Next.js by mastering the balance between Server-Side Rendering (SSR) and Client-Side Rendering (CSR). In this session, we’ll explore best practices and advanced strategies to enhance website performance, improve SEO, and deliver seamless user experiences.
